page.title: 11HORSE BREEDING: BOWERCHALKE
page.content: Race horses are bred for flat racing BREEDS - Blonde Aquitaine. Five mares go away for foaling and serving and return pregnant. Horses remain until old enough to train, then they go elsewhere. They can be seen being led around lanes & bridle ways, as they approach 2 years old. After their racing career, males are sold and fillies are retained for breeding. One of the enjoyable activities associated with the rearing, is visiting race meetings where the horses are running, sometimes as often as 3 times a week. Their performance is keenly watched.
